text: Andrew Alm Benson (September 24, 1917 - January 16, 2015) was an American biologist and a professor of biology at the University of California, San Diego until his retirement in 1989. He was known for his work in understanding the carbon cycle in plants. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American biologists Category:Educators from San Diego Category:Scientists from San Diego Category:People from Modesto, California
title: Andrew Benson
